name: UILayoutSupport
desc: A set of methods that provide layout support and access to layout anchors.

items.name: var length: CGFloat
items.desc: Provides the length, in points, of the portion of a view controller’s view that is overlaid by translucent or transparent UIKit bars.

items.name: var bottomAnchor: NSLayoutYAxisAnchor
items.desc: A layout anchor representing the guide’s bottom edge.

items.name: var heightAnchor: NSLayoutDimension
items.desc: A layout anchor representing the guide’s height.

items.name: var topAnchor: NSLayoutYAxisAnchor
items.desc: A layout anchor representing the guide’s top edge.
